players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the Mafioso, and I killed Bob last night. Stay vigilant as there are more criminals among us."
You: "I believe Charlie is telling the truth, and he killed Bob last night. I suggest we lynch him today to prevent further harm."
